settings.title: The made for you commitment
settings.text:
At Made For You we are deeply committed to sustainability and consciously choose to use recycled metal in all of our designs.

This is a great way to reduce the demand for newly mined gold that affects the ecological balance of our planet. Recycling & refining ensures the quality & purity of the metal.

settings.heading: Seed Collection

settings.subheading: Recommended products that go along with your

settings.text:
An explorer by heart and an environmentalist by choice, Anika is part of the generation leading the way in turning the tide on climate change.

She believes that — as artists, designers and creators — the time is now to take responsibility for the world we live in.

With organic shapes and sustainable materials, Anika’s designs aim to spark conversations and connections to create a bright future for the planet, together.

settings.title: Sustainable Jewelry Inspired by Nature
settings.subtitle: Having travelled and grown almost all over the world, Anika has an obsession for Earth which comes to life with the jewelry that she designs like her collection inspired by seeds.

settings.title: Charms Collection
settings.subtitle: A collection of meaningful medallions designed to express your own unique story.  Mix and match for a symbolic creation that's truly made for you.

settings.title: Inspired by Nature
settings.collection_info: Anika found inspiration in the peace and harmony of nature to create Earth & Sky — a new collection that reminds us to seek balance in our lives, and for the world.
Designed to represent the foundation of our environment, Anika’s first collection with MFY features the natural form of a seed as a symbol of hope, growth and our shared connection to the earth

settings.html:
#MFYDIAMONDS

SAVE WATER

Save 9 gallons of water*

REDUCE WASTE

Save 1056 pounds of mineral waste*

ELIMINATE EMISSIONS

Avoid 11400 grams of carbon emissions*

One Tree Planted

Through our partnership with ONE TREE PLANTED, your puchase plants a new tree.

* Based on 1ct MFY Lab Diamond vs Mined Diamond

MADE FOR YOU

Our partnership with One Tree Planted plants a NEW tree with every purchase you make.

Together, we aim to plant 10,000 trees to aid reforestation while also improving education, healthcare, humanitarian relief, and animal welfare.

settings.title: Our universe relies on balance and harmony and we must do our part to  protect this fragile  connection

MADE FOR YOU was founded to CREATE Beautiful Diamond jewelry with a conscious SPARKLE. From conflict-free production, sustainable materials & our partnership with One Tree Planted, we’re here to help create a cleaner and brighter future – with you.

settings.title: The made for you commitment
settings.text:
At Made For You we are deeply committed to sustainability and consciously choose to use recycled metal in all of our designs.

This is a great way to reduce the demand for newly mined gold that affects the ecological balance of our planet. Recycling & refining ensures the quality & purity of the metal.

settings.title: Lab grown diamonds
settings.text: #MFYdiamonds are sustainably lab grown, eleminating the detrimental effects of mining while saving water, reducing waste & eliminating emissions.
A Lab Grown Diamond is identical to a Real Diamond. They are sustainable and less expensive.

Our partnership with one tree planted plants a new tree with every purchase you make.
Together, we aim to plant 10,000 trees to aid reforestation while also improving education, healthcare, humanitarian relief, and animal welfare.

settings.title: About us
settings.text: From the beginning, we’ve made it our mission to create beautiful timeless jewelry that brings joy to your every day, while giving back to the world.

settings.title: Our Values
settings.text:
We want everyone to be able to indulge in quality, without it breaking the bank or, quite literally, costing the earth.

Our ongoing commitment to responsible, affordable luxury is our guiding light at every step, from our design team’s first sketches to conscious conflict-free production and change-making partnerships.

settings.title: Our Design
settings.text: All our pieces are designed to be effortlessly mixed, matched, stacked and layered so you can curate new unique looks whenever you feel like changing things up. With our ethical lab-grown diamonds, and 100% recycled gold and silver, you can treat yourself guilt-free.

settings.title: Our Creative Partners
settings.text:
We love collaborating with innovators and influencers whose values align with our own to make the biggest positive impact. Our latest collections were created with up-and-coming designer and environmentalist Anika Shah. And through our partnership with One Tree Planted, we’re helping reforestation efforts worldwide.

Above All, We’re Here For You, Our #MFY Community, To Create Jewelry You Love To Wear, And To Support The Environmental Issues You Care About.

settings.title:
Made for You,
Good for the World.
settings.text:
We know how important it is to you to take care of the world we live in — it’s what matters to us too.

We want you to be able to treat yourself (we know you deserve to!) safe in the knowledge that the environment’s being treated with respect.

All our jewelry meets high standards of quality and sustainability, because we think looking good and looking after the planet should go hand in hand.

settings.title: #MFYJewelry
settings.text:
We work exclusively with 100% recycled sterling silver and gold vermeil, and we’re especially proud to be among the first to make demi-fine jewelry with sustainable lab-grown diamonds.

The quality and composition of these materials is exactly the same as their mined versions, but without the negative impact on communities and the environment. It’s the way forward, and you’re part of the change.

settings.title:
One Tree Planted —
Our Way to Say Thank You

#MFY Materials —
Under the Microscope
settings.text:
All our #MFY diamonds are lab-grown — a sustainable process that creates diamonds identical in look, feel and even scientific composition to mined diamonds. All without the damaging effects on the environment and communities. It’s how things should be.

Compared to mined diamonds, every 1ct of a #MFY diamond:

Saves water 9 gallons at a time

Reduces waste by 1056 lbs of mineral waste

Eliminates emissions avoiding 11,400 g of carbon emissions

settings.title: Recycled Precious Metals
settings.text: Every single piece of #MFYjewelry is made from 100% recycled gold and silver. Re-using precious metals helps to reduce the amount of mined materials, so CO2 emissions are lower. This means we can create pieces of the same high quality while minimising any negative environmental impact.

settings.title: Gold vermeil
settings.text: Every single piece of #MFYjewelry is made from 100% recycled gold and silver. Re-using precious metals helps to reduce the amount of mined materials, so CO2 emissions are lower. This means we can create pieces of the same high quality while minimising any negative environmental impact.

settings.title: Quality Marks
settings.text: All our jewelry is stamped with the 925 symbol — you may have seen this before and wondered what it means. It’s a seal of approval that each piece contains an extremely high proportion of pure silver: 925 parts to every 1,000!

settings.title: How to Take Care of Your #MFY Pieces
settings.text: With such fine materials, your jewelry likes to be well looked after (who doesn’t?). It’s not a fan of moisture, chemicals or extreme conditions so remember to:
settings.content_one:
• Remove your jewelry before hopping in the shower, taking a dip or getting especially sweaty (hot yoga anyone?)
  • Store each piece somewhere safe when you’re not wearing it (the box it came in is ideal) and away from extreme temperatures, humidity and sunlight. Live in a very humid place? Leave the sachet of silica gel crystals in the box to soak up excess moisture
  • Keep your jewelry shining bright by cleaning it from time to time (we set an alert on our calendars every couple of months to help us remember!)
settings.content_two:
• Fine materials can be quite delicate and need gentle care — steer clear of hot water, chemicals and cleaners and don’t use paper towels or tissue paper as they can cause scratching
  • A clean, soft, slightly damp cloth is all you need to keep gemstones looking their best (a glasses cloth is ideal)
  • For the precious metals, use a jewelry polishing cloth and rub in one direction to get it gleaming

settings.text:
Our association with environmental charity One Tree Planted started with Anika’s collection.

Every time you treat yourself or your loved ones to a new piece of #MFYjewelry, we plant a new tree as a thank you for each order.

Each new tree helps to create a healthier climate, protect biodiversity and restore natural habitats.

Together, and with your support, we aim to plant 10,000 trees to aid reforestation around the world, while also supporting education, healthcare, humanitarian relief and animal welfare.

settings.title: About us
settings.text: From the beginning, we’ve made it our mission to create beautiful timeless jewelry that brings joy to your every day, while giving back to the world.
Our Collaboration

settings.title: About Anika
settings.text:
Born in New York, growing up in Mumbai and now studying in London, she has a deep appreciation and understanding of global issues and is driven by her passion for protecting the world we share together.

At only 17, Anika has already dedicated her time and energy to making a positive impact by working on an initiative to get clean water to people living in poverty in rural areas and supporting a host of environmental causes close to her heart.

In 2019, Anika initiated a tree-planting project in a village in India which has seen 45,000 new trees take root. We’ll be donating a percentage of profits from the MFYxAnika collections to support this transformative project and continue to make a difference.

settings.text_1:
An explorer by heart & an environmentalist by choice,

Anika is part of the generation leading the way in turning the tide on climate change.
settings.text_2:
She believes that — as artists, designers and creators — the time is now to take responsibility for the world we live in.

With organic shapes and sustainable materials, Anika’s designs aim to spark conversations and connections to create a bright future for the planet, together.
